title: P.S. and Co.
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Fusion, Kosher
description: Vegan gluten free cafe in Rittenhouse Square since Mar 2014. Offers breakfast food like house-made yogurt and sprouted muesli; plus lunch soups, salads, wraps, bowls; and afternoon tea and baked goods. Drinks include organic nut milkshake, hot tea, and cold pressed juice. Also known as Pure Sweets and Co.
